queries.query: SELECT sj.name AS [JobName], sj.[description] AS [JobDescription], SUSER_SNAME(sj.owner_sid) AS [JobOwner], sj.date_created, sj.[enabled], sj.notify_email_operator_id, sc.name AS [CategoryName] FROM msdb.dbo.sysjobs AS sj WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN msdb.dbo.syscategories AS sc WITH (NOLOCK) ON sj.category_id = sc.category_id ORDER BY sj.name OPTION (RECOMPILE)
